title: Richmond, London
summary: Richmond is a town in south-west London,[nb 1][2][3][4][5] 8.2 miles (13.2Â km) west-southwest of Charing Cross. It is on a meander of the River Thames, with many parks and open spaces, including Richmond Park, and many protected conservation areas,[6] which include much of Richmond Hill.[7] A specific Act of Parliament protects the scenic view of the River Thames from Richmond.[8]
